description: Uses yfinance (unofficial package) to access financial data and market information from Yahoo! Finance.

symbol.info: The stock symbol to retrieve data for (e.g., AAPL, GOOG, TSLA).

method.info: The type of financial data to retrieve.

num_news.info: The number of news articles to retrieve (only applicable for get_news method).

tool_description: Access financial data and market information from Yahoo! Finance.

warnings.empty_symbol: Stock symbol is empty. Please provide a valid stock symbol.

errors.import_error: Missing required dependency. Please install yfinance package: pip install yfinance
errors.empty_symbol: Stock symbol is required. Please provide a valid stock symbol.
errors.invalid_method: Invalid method '{method}'. Please select a valid data retrieval method.
errors.no_info_data: No company information available for symbol '{symbol}'
errors.no_news_data: No news articles available for symbol '{symbol}'
errors.method_not_found: Method '{method}' not found in yfinance ticker object
errors.data_retrieval_failed: Failed to retrieve {method} data for symbol '{symbol}': {error}
errors.tool_creation_failed: Failed to create Yahoo Finance tool: {error}
